Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.Gui.guiControllers.BoardComponents

Class Library_C

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.Gui.guiControllers.BoardComponents.Library_C
public class Library_C extends Object
This class governs the GUI of each player library so that it maintain its initial proportion in the case the main board stage is resized.
Author:
Francesco Lo Mastro

  • Method Details

    • setListeners

      public void setListeners(javafx.scene.layout.VBox father, double parts)
      This method is used to set up correct ratios to the different components of the common goal card. A listener is set to height and width property to make component responsive.
      Parameters:
      father - : vbox containing the components;
      parts - : number of parts;

      This method is used to get the grid.
